pages.text: $(o)$(l)BOW BEFORE ME, MORTALS.$()$(br2)Hans is the best of every creature. He doesn't actually need a sword to kick your ass he just likes swords a lot. It's actually a handicap. His fists could theoretically blast concrete into bits without breaking a sweat.$(br)And not to mention, his muscles are so thick he reflects any and all projectile fire.
$(o)EVERYTHING IS WEAK COMPARED TO THE GREAT HANS
